ex.reader
Class TagAnnot

java.lang.Object
  ex.reader.Annot
      ex.reader.TagAnnot

public class TagAnnot
extends Annot

This represents tags other than TokenTags. These are not considered tokens, but contribute to token features and, when parsing, to NT candidate features.
